question: What significant cultural title does the Old Town of Toruń, Poland hold since 1997?
true_answer: It is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
asked_question_translated: Qué título cultural significativo ostenta el casco antiguo de Toruń, Polonia, desde 1997?
answer: El casco antiguo de Toruń, Polonia, ostenta el título de Patrimonio de la Humanidad por la UNESCO desde 1997.
answer_translated_eng: The old town of Toruń, Poland, has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1997.
